title: To NDC or Not NDC - Is That the Question?
excerpt: After years of NDC discussions, the industry still needs 'demystifying' sessions. Perhaps we're asking the wrong questions entirely.
author: Ann Cederhall
content:
Why, after 7 years, does the aviation industry still require 'demystifying NDC' conference sessions? The term itself is problematic—'New' oversells the concept, and industry stakeholders can't even agree on what it means.

NDC is not a magic wand. It's only a very small part of the distribution puzzle. Your retail strategy is far more important—as is how you can improve the customer experience.
